name: ReorderTagPipelineRulesets
description:
Change the execution order of tag pipeline rulesets.

Use this tool to modify the order in which tag pipeline rulesets are executed in Datadog.

parameters.name: ruleset_order_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing an array of ruleset objects. Each ruleset object must include an `id` (string) and `type` ('ruleset'). This determines the order of execution for the rulesets.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
